item.title: Final Round of Gaza's Destruction Has Begun!
item.description: In this episode of ‘Padtaal Duniya Bhar Ki’ Newsclick's Prabir Purkayastha speaks on the involvement of Western countries in Israel's bloody plans.

item.title: Delhi: Stop Razing Slums, Provide Decent Houses!
item.description: A Convention of Left parties on housing rights reminded the government of its promise of ‘Jahan Jhuggi, Wahin Makaan’.

item.title: Himalayan Disasters: Natural or Man-Made?
item.description: Why are disasters continuously increasing from Uttarakhand, Himachal to Kishtwar? An interview with noted geologist S P Sati.
